When making an animation in (GL)Makie, what are some recommended ways to clear the scene every frame? Is there a more idiomatic/nicer way to do it other than using `delete!(scene, scene.plots[1])` below?
```scene = Scene(resolution=(1000, 1000), show_axis=false)
record(scene, "test.mp4") do io
    for t in range(0, 1, length=25)
        if !isempty(scene.plots)
            delete!(scene, scene.plots[1])
        end
        surface!(scene, 0:0.1:10, 0:0.1:10, (x,y) -> rand())
        update!(scene)
        recordframe!(io)
    end
end```
